rationale: The segment contains 'major increase', but 'increase' is a noun, not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Then, if you look at 2015, that was when we saw the major increase in cases in Africaâ€”in Egypt, along the Nile River Valley, in people raising domestic ducks. That time [In 2015] there were [hundreds of] cases in Egypt alone that year in humans.
